name: Doge Rangers
description:
You have to find all the dogs to save the city, but they are too distracted XD

This mini game was made by me and my wife for the Brackeys Game Jam

Controls: WASD

Instructions: Find all dogs and find the exit before the time ends

Credits:

  • Development: @johnperess
  • Art: @barros_katleen
  • Sound Effects: Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
  • Music: Arcade Game BGM #3
